incidents.name: Partial Outage for multiple tools is unavailable for some customers

incident_updates.body: HubSpot is now fully accessible. We've identified and addressed the root cause of the issue. The incident has been fully resolved and HubSpot should be working properly. No data was lost.

We've addressed the issue that caused a partial outage for multiple tools between 2:10 PM EDT (UTC -04:00) and 2:21 PM EDT (UTC -04:00) on Apr 1, 2025. We're monitoring performance closely to ensure the tools recover properly.

We've addressed the issue that caused a partial outage for multiple tools between 2:10 PM EDT (UTC -04:00) and 2:21 PM EDT (UTC -04:00) on Apr 1, 2025. We're monitoring performance closely to ensure the tools recover properly.  We will be back with an update within 30 minutes.

We've addressed the issue that caused a partial outage for multiple tools between 2:10 PM EDT (UTC -04:00) and 2:21 PM EDT (UTC -04:00) on Apr 1, 2025. We're monitoring performance closely to ensure the tools recover properly. We will be back with an update within 30 minutes.

We've addressed the issue that caused Partial Outage for multiple tools to be unavailable since 2:21 PM EDT (UTC -04:00) on Apr 1, 2025. We're monitoring performance closely to ensure the tools recover properly. We will be back with an update within 15 minutes.

We've addressed the issue that caused Partial Outage for multiple tools  to be unavailable since 2:21 PM EDT (UTC -04:00) on Apr 1, 2025. We're monitoring performance closely to ensure the tools recover properly. We will be back with an update within 15 minutes.

We've identified the issue that's caused Partial Outage for multiple tools to be unavailable since 2:21 PM EDT (UTC -04:00) on Apr 1, 2025. We're addressing the cause of this issue and will update this page when we have more information. We will be back with an update within 15 minutes.

incidents.name: Workflow actions were unavailable for some users

incident_updates.body: Between 1:36 PM EDT (UTC -04:00) on Mar 28, 2025 and 2:19 PM EDT (UTC -04:00) on Mar 28, 2025, some customers experienced issues with Workflow actions. As of 2:19 PM EDT (UTC -04:00) on Mar 28, 2025, Workflow actions are working properly and the incident has been fully resolved. Any workflows that had an error during this time will need to be manually re-run.

components.name: Chat & Automation

incidents.name: Email Sending is currently delayed for some customers

incident_updates.body: Email Sending is no longer experiencing delays. We've identified and addressed the cause of the delays that began at 11:00 AM EDT (UTC -04:00). As of 1:55 PM EDT all previously delayed emails have been sent.

We have addressed the issue that was causing email sends to be delayed. All new email sends are fully recovered. We continue to process through the backlog of delayed emails, which still has a delay of around an hour, but is actively recovering. We will be back with an update within an hour.

We are continuing to investigate the root cause into why emails within our North America infrastructure are currently delayed. We continue to operate with a delay of around an hour for outbound emails. We will be back with an update within an hour.

We've identified an issue within our system that is delaying some email sends within our North America infrastructure. This is impacting about half of all email sends now, which are seeing delays of around an hour. We are working to address the root cause.  We will be back with an update within an hour.

Email Sending in HubSpot is experiencing delays. Our team is investigating the cause of this issue and will update this page when more information is available. We will be back with an update within 30 minutes.

components.name: Marketing Tools
components.description: Loading and data processing of Marketing tools like Ads, Email, Social, Forms and Lists.

incidents.name: HubSpot may be unavailable for some users

incident_updates.body: HubSpot is now working for all users. We addressed the root cause of the issue that prevented CRM records from being created or updated, and the issue is fully resolved.
We have identified the cause of this issue. At this point, the ability to create and update CRM records has been restored. We will be back with an update within an hour.

We are continuing to investigate the root cause of an issue that is preventing users from creating or updating records in the CRM since 10:42 AM EDT (UTC -04:00) on Mar 25, 2025. We've identified a core service that is degraded and are working to address the performance issues now. We will be back with an update within 30 minutes.

We are investigating an issue where some users are unable to create or update CRM objects due to persistent errors. This appears to be related to degraded performance in a core internal service. Early signs indicate that the issue may be isolated to our na1 datacenter. Our teams are working to identify the root cause and implement mitigations. At this time, there are no known workarounds. We will provide our next update by 16:00 UTC or sooner if new information becomes available. We apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your patience as we work to resolve this issue. We will be back with an update within 30 minutes.
We're investigating reports that HubSpot may be unavailable for some users. We'll update this page when we have more information.

incidents.name: HubSpot data is currently delayed for all customers

incident_updates.body: We are no longer experiencing delays. We've identified and addressed the cause of the delays that began at 12.30 PM EDT (UTC -04:00) on Mar 24, 2025 all delayed data has been processed and caught up. The issue is now fully resolved.
We've addressed the issue that was causing HubSpot data delays for portals hosted in our United States (East) data center, and are actively monitoring the recovery. No data has been lost.

incidents.name: Reporting is unavailable for some customers

incident_updates.body: Lists, Datasets, Snowflake Data Share, Reports, and Buyer Intelligence are now fully accessible. Together with Snowflake, we've identified and addressed the root cause of the issue. The incident has been fully resolved and Lists, Datasets, Snowflake Data Share, Reports, and Buyer Intelligence should be working properly. No data was lost.

We've worked with Snowflake to address the issue that caused Lists, Datasets, Snowflake Data Share, Reports, and Buyer Intelligence to become impaired since 10:25 AM EDT (UTC -04:00) on Mar 19, 2025. We're monitoring performance closely to ensure the tools recover properly.

We are continuing to work with Snowflake to resolve the root issue, but don't have any new updates right now. Updates from Snowflake can be found on their status page: https://status.snowflake.com/incidents/9mwvw50z4wnm

In the meantime, we have implemented an update to Lists to make sure they are now working properly.

We will be back with an update within 3 hours. We will be back with an update within 3 hours.
We are continuing to work with Snowflake to resolve this issue, but don't have any new updates right now.  We will be back with an update within 3 hours.

Lists, Datasets, Snowflake Data Share, Reports, and Buyer Intelligence are all experiencing issues including failures to load. The problems with these parts of our platform are impacted by an outage from Snowflake. We are working with Snowflake to resolve the issue. 

Snowflake's status page can be found here: https://status.snowflake.com/incidents/9mwvw50z4wnm We will be back with an update within an hour.

Reports, Datasets, Snowflake Data Share, and Lists are still failing to load for many customers. This is due to a problem with a third party service and we expect this issue to continue until the third party is able to resolve their issue. We will be back with an update within an hour.

Reports created in the Custom Report Builder are failing to load. The creation of new lists are also delayed. We are continuing to investigate the source of the issues. We will be back with an update within an hour.
Reporting isn't available right now. We're investigating what's causing this issue and will update this page when we have more information. We will be back with an update within an hour.

incidents.name: HubSpot's public search API was unavailable for some users

incident_updates.body: Between 1:34 PM EDT (UTC -04:00) on Mar 11, 2025 and 2:43 PM EDT (UTC -04:00) on Mar 11, 2025, some customers experienced issues with HubSpot's public search API. This was caused by an unintended configuration change that lowered the API's rate limits. As of 2:43 PM EDT (UTC -04:00) on Mar 11, 2025, HubSpot's public search API is working properly and the incident has been fully resolved.

incidents.name: Outlook Connected Email is unavailable for some customers

incident_updates.body:
Between 8:40 PM UTC and 9:45 PM UTC on March 1, Microsoft reported a global outage with Microsoft 365 services.

This outage resulted in Outlook connected email to be unavailable in HubSpot.

Some HubSpot users may have also received an email notification that their Outlook inboxes have been disconnected from their HubSpot accounts.

As of March 2 at 1:22 AM EST, all Outlook inboxes were reconnected to HubSpot accounts.

We apologize for any confusion and appreciate your patience as we reconnected inboxes.

A detailed postmortem is available at https://product.hubspot.com/blog/hubspot-incident-report-for-march-2-2025
We continue to work on reconnecting all affected inboxes. We will be back with an update within 3 hours.

We are working on reconnecting all affected inboxes.

In the interim, users with disconnected inboxes can manually reconnect them if they prefer not to wait. We will be back with an update within an hour.

We have identified the issue that caused Outlook Connected Email to be unavailable since 3:00 PM EST (UTC -05:00) on Mar 1, 2025.

We are working to reconnect all affected inboxes.
 We will be back with an update within an hour.

We've identified the issue that's caused Outlook Connected Email to be unavailable since 3:00 PM EST (UTC -05:00) on Mar 1, 2025. We're addressing the cause of this issue and will update this page when we have more information. We will be back with an update within an hour.

incident_updates.body: Between 2:22 PM EST (UTC -05:00) on Feb 26, 2025 and 2:43 PM EST (UTC -05:00) on Feb 26, 2025, some customers experienced issues with Updates to CRM objects. This was caused by data migration. As of 2:43 PM EST (UTC -05:00) on Feb 26, 2025, Updates to CRM objects is working properly and the incident has been fully resolved.

incident_updates.body: The issues with call and email associations in the iOS app (version 4.56.0) is fixed in version 4.56.1. We continue to ask all customers to please upgrade to the latest version 4.56.1.

We've addressed the issue that caused Call and Emails Associations on iOS mobile devices using version 4.56.0 to be unavailable since 4:30 AM EST (UTC -05:00) on Feb 7, 2025. incidents.name: Workflow branches was unavailable for all users

incident_updates.body:
There was an issue with some filter criteria based workflow branches between 8:47 am ET and 10:43 am ET. If a record went through a workflow branch with a filter criteria that referenced an object associated with the enrolled record, that record went down the "None met" branch.

Customers should re-enroll anything that enrolled during that time only if they are comfortable having the workflow run again.

We apologize for the inconvenience this generated.

incidents.name: HubSpot is currently unavailable for customers in Europe

incident_updates.body: HubSpot software is now working for all users. We've resolved the issue by scaling up a service that was causing intermittent failures. The incident has now been fully resolved. No data was lost.
We fixed the issue that caused intermittent failures in Europe. We are monitoring to make sure it doesn't happen again. We will give a final update when it's fully resolved.

The HubSpot app has been stable since 10:18 AM UTC. We’re deploying extra capacity to resolve the intermittent failures in Europe. We will give an update once the underlying issue has been fully resolved.
The HubSpot app is intermittently not loading for some customers in Europe. We're investigating the cause of this issue and will update this page when we have more information.

incident_updates.body: Between 8:53 PM EST (UTC -05:00) on Jan 27, 2025 and 10:03 AM EST (UTC -05:00) on Jan 28, 2025, some customers experienced issues with our public search APIs which caused a higher call failure due to rate limiting. incident_updates.body: Between 5:15 AM EST (UTC -05:00) on Jan 6, 2025 and 8:00 AM EST (UTC -05:00) on Jan 10, 2025, some customers experienced issues with Snowflake views and tables. This was caused by a HubSpot bug that temporarily removed user access to Snowflake tables and views. As of 8:00 AM EST (UTC -05:00) on Jan 10, 2025, Snowflake is working properly and the incident has been fully resolved.

incidents.name: Roll-up Properties are currently delayed for EU customers

incident_updates.body: Roll-up properties are no longer experiencing delays. We've identified and addressed the cause of the delays that began at 8:29 AM EST (UTC -05:00) on Dec 2, 2024 as a problem with an underlying system failure. The issue is now fully resolved.

We've identified the cause of the Roll-up Properties being delayed up to 6 hours for EU customers since 8:29 AM EST (UTC -05:00) on Dec 2, 2024. These delays may impact tools such as reports, emails, etc using roll-up properties in HubSpot. Our team is working on reducing the delay and will update this page when more information is available.

incidents.name: CRM functionality is partially degraded

incident_updates.body: We've identified and addressed the root cause of the performance degradation. The incident has been fully resolved and should be working properly. No data was lost.
We've addressed the issue that caused performance degradation  since 10:54 AM EST (UTC -05:00) on Nov 25, 2024. We're monitoring closely to ensure the tools recover properly.

We've identified the issue that's caused performance degradation since 10:54 AM EST (UTC -05:00) on Nov 25, 2024. We're addressing the cause of this issue and will update this page when we have more information.

We are experiencing a system-wide performance degradation that is primarily impacting search, indexing, exports, and data synchronization of CRM records, resulting in a 1% error rate.

While most of the application remains functional, users may encounter increased error rates and slower loading times, particularly in areas that interact with CRM records. These issues can typically be resolved with a page refresh.

Our team is actively investigating and working to resolve the underlying cause of these performance issues.

incidents.name: Some service email sends from to Yahoo emails are not being delivered

incident_updates.body: From October 31 at 6:30 AM EDT (UTC -04:00) until November 1 at 6:30 AM EDT, some tracked service emails sent from portals without a custom tracking domain to Yahoo inboxes were not delivered. Deliveries are now succeeding consistently for new emails.
We’re seeing deliveries to Yahoo domains succeeding consistently as of 7am ET. We’re monitoring the tools closely to make sure deliveries continue to be stable.

Since October 31 at 6:35am ET, some tracked service emails being sent to Yahoo inboxes are not being delivered. We're investigating the cause of this issue.

Affected customers can restore delivery by connecting a custom tracking domain.

incidents.name: Integration Products are currently delayed for some customers

incident_updates.body: Between 11:30 PM EDT on June 6 and 11:30 AM EDT on June 7, some customers experienced Slack, Salesforce, Microsoft Teams, QuickBooks, Shopify, SurveyMonkey, and GoToWebinar integration delays, webhooks execution delays, and app log access issues. The root cause has been resolved. We apologize for any inconvenience and appreciate your patience as we resolved the issue.

We've addressed the issue that's caused Slack, Salesforce, Microsoft Teams, QuickBooks, Shopify, SurveyMonkey, and GoToWebinar integration delays, webhooks execution delays, and app log access issues. We’re monitoring performance closely to ensure the tools recover properly.

We've identified the issue that's caused Slack, Salesforce, Microsoft Teams, QuickBooks, Shopify, SurveyMonkey, and GoToWebinar integration delays, webhooks execution delays, and app log access issues since 11:30 PM EDT on June 6. We will provide an update once we've addressed the issue.

incidents.name: Marketing Email Editor was unavailable for some users

incident_updates.body: Between 06:55 AM & 07:10 AM EST on June 5, the Marketing Email Editor tool wasn't loading for some customers. We've identified and addressed the issue. The incident has been fully resolved.

incidents.name: Web analytics is currently delayed for some customers

incident_updates.body: Web analytics is no longer experiencing delays. We've identified and addressed the cause of the delays that began at 9:57 AM EDT (UTC -04:00) on May 28, 2024. The issue is now fully resolved.
Reports should be full caught up now. We're monitoring the tools closely to make sure that all processes recover properly.
Most data should now be caught up. Only the Pages and Topics Clusters reports are still delayed.
Some delays have been resolved. But important systems like contact updates from web activities are still delayed.
We are continuing to work on resolving the delays in web analytics. We will share updates as we get new information about time to recover.

We've identified the cause of the Web analytics delays of up to 2 hours since 9:57 AM EDT (UTC -04:00) on May 28, 2024. These delays may impact tools such as Lists, Workflows, Lead Scoring, chat widget, audience targeting, custom event ingestion, and campaign reporting in HubSpot.

incidents.name: Our Office 365 Add-in for the Outlook for Windows app is unavailable for some customers

incident_updates.body: Office 365 Add-in for Outlook for Windows is now fully accessible. We've identified and addressed the root cause of the issue. The incident has been fully resolved and Office 365 Add-in for Outlook for Windows should be working properly. No data was lost.
Our Office 365 Add-in for the Outlook for Windows app isn't available right now. We're investigating what's causing this issue and will update this page when we have more information.

incidents.name: List processing is currently delayed for some customers

incident_updates.body: Between 11:30 AM EST and 1:30 PM EST on April 29, 2024, some customers experienced list processing delays that impacted tools such as workflow enrollments and action execution and list membership processing. The root cause has been resolved, and no data was lost. We apologize for any inconvenience and appreciate your patience as we resolved the issue.

List processing in HubSpot is experiencing delays. This may impact tools such as workflow enrollments and action execution and list membership processing in HubSpot. Our team is investigating the cause of this issue and will update this page when more information is available.

incidents.name: Sales email was unavailable for some users

incident_updates.body: Between 8:48 AM EDT (UTC -04:00) on Apr 22, 2024 and 9:08 AM EDT (UTC -04:00) on Apr 22, 2024, some customers experienced issues with Sales email. This was caused by a feature rollout which has since been disabled. As of 9:08 AM EDT (UTC -04:00) on Apr 22, 2024, Sales email is working properly and the incident has been fully resolved.

incidents.name: HubSpot is currently experiencing loading delays in Eastern Europe

incident_updates.body: HubSpot software is now working for all users located in Eastern Europe. We've identified and addressed the cause of the issue with our content delivery network provider, Cloudflare, to resolve it. More updates: https://www.cloudflarestatus.com/incidents/fjh89m55qxt7. The incident has now been fully resolved. No data was lost.

We are investigating a performance issue impacting HubSpot customers located in Eastern Europe. We are working with our content delivery network provider, Cloudflare, to resolve it. More updates: https://www.cloudflarestatus.com/incidents/fjh89m55qxt7

incidents.name: Landing and website pages were unavailable for some users

incident_updates.body: Between 9:02 AM EDT (UTC -04:00) and 9:26 AM EDT on Apr 3, 2024, CMS Professional and Enterprise users experienced issues with incorrect page limit notifications, which blocked users from creating new or updating existing pages. As of 9:26 AM EDT (UTC -04:00), page limits are working properly, and the incident has been fully resolved. No content was impacted.

incident_updates.body: Between 7:45 PM EST (UTC -05:00) on Mar 4, 2024 and 9:30 PM EST (UTC -05:00) on Mar 4, 2024, some customers experienced issues with Workflows. incidents.name: HubSpot is currently unavailable for some customers.

incident_updates.body: HubSpot is now working for all users. HubSpot experienced brief service disruptions from 10:15 to 10:35 AM EST (UTC-5), and 11:53 AM to 12:00 PM EST, affecting HubSpot CRM, Marketing, Sales, and Service tools. All issues have been resolved. No data was lost, and no action is needed from your end. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

Earlier today, HubSpot had a brief service disruption from 10:15 to 10:35 AM ET (UTC-5), affecting Marketing, Sales, Service, and CRM tools. We've resolved this issue, and we're monitoring the situation for stability. No data was lost, and no action is needed from you. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.
HubSpot was unavailable for some users from 10:15 to 10:35 AM ET (UTC -5). Our team has identified and resolved the root cause of this issue. We are now monitoring the situation.

incidents.name: Notification links were blocked on the Chrome browser for some users

incident_updates.body: Between 1:25 PM EST (UTC -05:00) on Jan 16, 2024 and 12:45 PM EST (UTC -05:00) on Jan 18, 2024, some customers experienced issues with Notification links. These links were being blocked on the Chrome browser preventing users from reaching the link destination. As of 12:45 PM EST (UTC -05:00) on Jan 18, 2024, Notification links on the Chrome browser are working properly and the incident has been fully resolved.

incidents.name: Workflows was unavailable for some users

incident_updates.body:
Between 1:40 PM EST (UTC -05:00) and 4:06 PM EST (UTC -05:00) on Jan 4, 2024, some customers experienced issues with Workflows. This caused the "enroll existing records" choice to not enroll records as expected. We have identified and fixed the underlying cause of this issue.
As of 4:06 PM EST the "enroll existing records" choice is working correctly for newly enabled or edited workflows. All previously impacted workflows will be processed automatically without actions needed from customers. To avoid records being enrolled twice, please do not manually retry workflows.

incidents.name: Notifications was unavailable for some users

incident_updates.body: Between 7:45 AM EST on Dec 15, 2023 and 9:38 AM EST on Dec 18, 2023, some customers experienced issues with Notifications. This was caused by an issue with our delivery system. As of 9:38 AM EST on Dec 18, 2023, Notifications is working properly, no data was lost and some important notifications have been resent. The incident has been fully resolved.

incidents.name: Calling is unavailable for some customers

incident_updates.body: Phone number acquisition and first time calling is available again for all European customers.

Phone number acquisition and first time calling is unavailable right now for some European customers. We’ve identified the cause of this issue as an outage with Twilio, a cloud calling and messaging platform. 

A resolution is currently in progress, and we appreciate your patience. You can also monitor Twilio's status directly via this link: https://status.twilio.com/

incidents.name: HubSpot Sales Chrome extension caused high CPU usage for some users

incident_updates.body: We’ve identified the issue in the HubSpot Sales Chrome extension that caused high CPU usage for some users. The fixed version of the extension, 2.9.014344, has been published and available for update as of December 5, 5:55AM EST. Please update to the latest version of the extension to see resolution of this issue.

incidents.name: Sending emails from the CRM was unavailable for some users

incident_updates.body: Between 1:18 PM EST (UTC -05:00) on Dec 4, 2023 and 1:46 PM EST (UTC -05:00) on Dec 4, 2023, some customers experienced issues with sending emails from the CRM. This was caused by issues generating unsubscribe links. As of 1:46 PM EST on Dec 4, 2023, sending emails from the CRM is working properly and the incident has been fully resolved.
